price: 61. esos se apresuran a realizar buenas acciones y compiten (entre ellos) en su realización.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ يُسَٰرِعُونَ فِي ٱلۡخَيۡرَٰتِ وَهُمۡ لَهَا سَٰبِقُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: ulāika yusāriʿūna fī al-khayrāti wahum lahā sābiqūna
